resources.string: Explore Amsterdam and discover unique details of the city\'s rich history. Historic houses and mansions were often decorated with gable stones: carved and painted stone tablets fixed on the facade. They gave information about the owner or the business, sometimes straightforward, sometimes through subtle hints or even riddles. Before street names and house numbers were established the location of a house was referred by the gable stone.

Start the quest and search for the specific gable stones. Your missions consists of 10 clues, locate the gable stones and/or other parts of a house as described in the clues. Complete all items, discover hidden gems while emerging in the history of Amsterdam. Explore Amsterdam in an unique and memorable way.
